alert.note: Alert for Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 10 at 10:46PM CDT until September 11 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR ARMSTRONG...EASTERN RANDALL...CARSON AND SOUTHEASTERN POTTER COUNTIES... At 1045 PM CDT, automated weather equipment reported severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles north of Panhandle to 5 miles northwest of Wayside, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. At 1042 PM CDT, automated weather equipment recorded a 59 mph wind gust 4 miles west northwest of Pantex. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Panhandle, Claude, Washburn, Wayside, Palo Duro Canyon, and Pantex. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
